00063     class _OgreExport HighLevelGpuProgram : public GpuProgram
00064     {
00065     protected:
00067         bool mHighLevelLoaded;
00069         GpuProgramPtr mAssemblerProgram;
00071         mutable bool mConstantDefsBuilt;

00076         virtual void unloadHighLevel(void);
00080         virtual void loadHighLevelImpl(void);
00083         virtual void createLowLevelImpl(void) = 0;
00085         virtual void unloadHighLevelImpl(void) = 0;
00087         virtual void populateParameterNames(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params);
00094         virtual void buildConstantDefinitions() const = 0;

00099         void unloadImpl();
00100     public:

00104         ~HighLevelGpuProgram();

00139     class _OgreExport HighLevelGpuProgramPtr : public SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram> 
00140     {
00141     public:
00142         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr() : SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram>() {}
00143         explicit HighLevelGpuProgramPtr(HighLevelGpuProgram* rep) : SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram>(rep) {}
00144         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr(const HighLevelGpuProgramPtr& r) : SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram>(r) {} 
00145         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr(const ResourcePtr& r) : SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram>()
00146         {
00147             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00148             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00149             {
00150                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00151                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00152                 pRep = static_cast<HighLevelGpuProgram*>(r.getPointer());
00153                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00154                 if (pUseCount)
00155                 {
00156                     ++(*pUseCount);
00157                 }
00158             }
00159         }
00160 
00162         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr& operator=(const ResourcePtr& r)
00163         {
00164             if (pRep == static_cast<HighLevelGpuProgram*>(r.getPointer()))
00165                 return *this;
00166             release();
00167             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00168             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00169             {
00170                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00171                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00172                 pRep = static_cast<HighLevelGpuProgram*>(r.getPointer());
00173                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00174                 if (pUseCount)
00175                 {
00176                     ++(*pUseCount);
00177                 }
00178             }
00179             else
00180             {
00181                 // RHS must be a null pointer
00182                 assert(r.isNull() && "RHS must be null if it has no mutex!");
00183                 setNull();
00184             }
00185             return *this;
00186         }
00188         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr& operator=(const GpuProgramPtr& r);
00189     };
00193 }
